Introduction¶

Zhudi is a tool whose purpose is to help you with learning Chinese. It provides you an interface to the CEDICT family of dictionaries (which include English/French/Spanish/German to Chinese).

It also offers some valuable tools needed by the learner of Chinese that currently are:

  • Automatic word segmentation;
  • Pronunciation in Zhuyin Fuhao;
  • Key codes for each character in Cangjie5, Wubi86 and Array30.

Enjoy using Zhudi!

See also

CEDICT, Chinese-English dictionary database

CFDICT, Chinese-French dictionary database

HanDeDict, Chinese-German dictionary database

ChE-Dicc, Chinese-Spanish dictionary database
